alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Douglas; Moultrie; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Moultrie, southeastern Piatt, southern Champaign and western Douglas Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bement to near Hammond to near Bethany. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Atwood around 700 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Tuscola, Tolono, Arcola, Villa Grove, Arthur, Philo, Sidney, Pesotum and Camargo. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 205 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and east central Illinois.
